Paragraph: Furthermore , PTATDPP shows a promising PCE of 4.23% when a non-fullerene acceptor ( di-PBI ) is used as an electron acceptor material for the PSC device.

| 4.23% |

| di-PBI |
| electron acceptor material |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PTATDPP PCE |
| 4.23% |
| non-fullerene acceptor (di-PBI) |
| electron acceptor material for the PSC device |

Note: "PCE" stands for Power Conversion Efficiency, which is a material property.
